Simon Cowell is now reportedly doing all he can to convince his American business partners that the 27-year-old Cheryl Cole has what it takes to draw audiences in across the Atlantic. The source added to The Sun newspaper, Simon Cowell has been the only one pushing for her and trying to convince everyone that she'll be a big hit. They want to see if the American public warm to her before she takes on such a high-profile role in one of the biggest shows on U.S. TV.
